add_coti.title: Add COTI Network to MetaMask

step1.title: Step 1: Open MetaMask
step1.text: Click the network dropdown at the top left of MetaMask and select 'Add a custom network'.

step2.title: Step 2: Enter COTI Mainnet Info
step2.text:
Fill in the fields with:

Network Name: COTI
RPC URL: https://mainnet.coti.io/rpc
Chain ID: 2632500
Symbol: COTI
Block Explorer: https://mainnet.cotiscan.io

step3.title: Step 3: Save & Switch
step3.text: Click 'Save'. MetaMask will switch to the COTI network automatically.

step4.title: You're All Set!
step4.text: You‚Äôve added the COTI network to MetaMask. You can now bridge tokens or interact with dApps on COTI V2.

add_coti.note_intro: This website is 100% open-source and created for the COTI community to share technical instructions.
add_coti.note_1_part1: ‚Ä¢ All source code is available publicly on
add_coti.note_2: ‚Ä¢ The site loads directly from GitHub Pages ‚Äî no hidden code or injected content.
add_coti.note_3: ‚Ä¢ No wallet connection is required to view or use this site.
add_coti.note_4: ‚Ä¢ We understand crypto users are cautious. Please feel free to inspect the code before clicking any links.
add_coti.note_closing: ‚úÖ Stay safe, stay informed, and explore the COTI ecosystem with confidence.

add_token.title: Add COTI V2 Token
add_token.heading: How to Add a COTI V2 Token to MetaMask
add_token.complete: You have completed all the steps!
add_token.note_intro: This website is 100% open-source and created for the COTI community to share technical instructions.
add_token.note_1: • All source code is available publicly on
add_token.note_2: • The site loads directly from GitHub Pages — no hidden code or injected content.
add_token.note_3: • No wallet connection is required to view or use this site.
add_token.note_4: • We understand crypto users are cautious. Please feel free to inspect the code before clicking any links.
add_token.note_closing: ✅ Stay safe, stay informed, and explore the COTI ecosystem with confidence.

step1.title: Step 1: Go to COTI Token Explorer

step2.title: Step 2: Search and Select Your Token
step2.text: Type the name of the token you want to import and click on it to open the token page.

step3.title: Step 3: Copy the Token Address
step3.text: On the token's page, copy the token contract address to your clipboard.

step4.title: Step 4: Open MetaMask
step4.text: Launch your MetaMask extension or mobile app.

step5.title: Step 5: Click the 3 Dots and Choose "Import Tokens"
step5.text: In the Tokens tab, tap the 3 dots icon, then select Import Tokens.

step6.title: Step 6: Select Network & Paste Address
step6.text: Select the COTI network, then paste the token address into the input field.

step7.title: Step 7: Click Next
step7.text: Click the Next button to continue.

step8.title: Step 8: Click Import
step8.text: Click Import to finish adding the token.

step9.title: Step 9: Done!
step9.text: The token should now appear in your MetaMask wallet.

bridge_hack.title: Bridge Hack
bridge_hack.tip: One tip for you: if you want to bridge more than 25K $COTI from Layer 2 to Ethereum in one day, use multiple wallets. Each wallet can bridge up to 25K $COTI. For example, if you want to bridge 100K $COTI, split it into four wallets with 25K each, then start bridging from each wallet to Ethereum. It worked for me ‚Äî and yes, it should work for you too.
